description:

Sadly, it’s a competitive industry, and platforms are often making tough decisions regarding their catalogue. Now one such fan-favorite series has been canceled by Netflix following the release of only one season. It’s certainly [...]

title: Netflix Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After Just One Season
